import { useState } from "react"; import { userLogin } from "../serivces/userService"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; export const Login = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ field1: "", field2: "" }); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); let result = await userLogin(formData); let user = { id: result.id, name: result.name, mail: result.mail }; localStorage.setItem("user", JSON.stringify(user)); navigate('/home'); window.location.reload(); }; return (<>
